snippet: A Metropolitan Opera union and management almost did not begin their contract talks on Monday after labor invited reporters to attend.
abstract: First round of contract talks begins between Metropolitan Opera and American Guild of Musical Artists, union representing its chorus, dancers, singers and stage managers; Met is seeking to cut pay and benefits for its workers for the first time in decades.
lead_paragraph: A Metropolitan Opera union and management almost did not begin their contract talks on Monday after labor invited reporters to attend.

headline.main: Met Opera Contract Talks Stumble to a Start
headline.print_headline: Met Opera Contract Talks Stumble to a Start
